TITLE: Episode 75 - Sandwiches and Satire with Robbie the Fire
DESCRIPTION: This week the Vixens are joined by comedian and podcast host, Robbie "The Fire" Bernstein to discuss female humor in comedy vs. the real world, sandwiches and other important life skills.
